TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ErrorResponseCategory extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The ErrorResponseCategory enumeration contains possible DSML error responses.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseCategory AuthenticationFailed = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Authentication failed. The value is equal to 5.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseCategory ConnectionClosed = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The DSML provider connected to a server, but the server closed the connection without responding to the request. The value is equal to 2.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseCategory CouldNotConnect = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The DSML provider was unable to connect to a server. The value is equal to 1.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseCategory GatewayInternalError = int32(4)

Docs.summary: There is an internal gateway error. The value is equal to 4.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseCategory MalformedRequest = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The client failed to specify a request ID for each request. The value is equal to 3.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseCategory NotAttempted = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The DSML provider did not attempt to execute a request element. The value is equal to 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseCategory Other = int32(7)

Docs.summary: An unknown error occurred. The value is equal to 7.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ErrorResponseCategory UnresolvableUri = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The client provider is unable to resolve the URI to a value that can transferred to the server. The value is equal to 6.
